snippet: Instead of remorse, Representative Laura Richardson displayed “utter disdain” for attempts to investigate her disgraceful behavior during her re-election campaign.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Rep Laura Richardson for her seeming remorselessness after the House Ethics Committee voted to reprimand her for seven ethics violations related to her re-election campaign.
lead_paragraph: Instead of remorse, Representative Laura Richardson displayed “utter disdain” for attempts to investigate her disgraceful behavior during her re-election campaign.

headline.seo: The House Reprimands One of Its Own
headline.main: The House Reprimands One of Its Own
headline.print_headline: The House Reprimands One of Its Own
